channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Extreme hypotheticals': SEAL Team 6 assassination resurfaces in immunity dissents
item.description: Could a commander in chief order SEAL Team 6 to assassinate a political rival and not face criminal prosecution? That is the hypothetical raised by two justices.

item.title: Fourth of July could be wet with threat of severe storms and torrential rain
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 7/1: CBS News 24/7 Episode 2
item.description: Supreme Court rules former President Trump is entitled to some immunity; Jury enters Day 5 of deliberations in Karen Read murder trial.

item.title: DHS rolls out new technology for firefighters
item.description: DHS rolls out new technology for firefighters

item.title: South Main Street in Batavia closed for hours during police stand-off
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 3 reasons to access your home equity this July
item.description: Looking for an inexpensive credit option? Here's why you should turn to your home equity this July.

item.title: Judge declares mistrial in Karen Read murder case after jury says it's undecided
item.description: The judge in the Karen Read murder trial has declared a mistrial after the jury said it was unable to reach a unanimous consensus on the fifth day of deliberations.

item.title: Justice Thomas Goes Rogue on Trump Immunity Case, Pushes to Ditch Special Prosecutors
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Early Prime Day deal: Save $299 on a robot vacuum and mop combo
item.description: It's a robot vacuum and mop all-in-one. Take advantage of this early Prime Day deal before it disappears.

item.title: Hunter Biden sues Fox News over fictional miniseries
item.description: Hunter Biden has filed suit against Fox News over their production of a fictional miniseries his attorney call "an effort to harass, annoy, alarm, and humiliate him."

item.title: Judge issues special instructions, tells Karen Read jurors to resolve ‘fundamental differences’
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: What's a personality hire? Here's the value they bring to the workplace.
item.description: So-called personality hires can bring real value to companies, but are sometimes resented by co-workers.

item.title: WATCH: Golden retriever adorably demands to be part of mom's father-daughter wedding dance
item.description: When Annie Tews got married in Nebraska, her 2-year-old dog, Wrigley, wanted to join her and her dad on the dance floor.

item.title: Don’t Buy a House in These 10 US Cities: Growing Populations and Overcrowding
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Mistrial in Karen Read murder trial
item.description: Karen Read's murder trial has ended in a mistrial after a hung jury said deep divisions left them unable to reach a verdict. Read was accused in the 2022 killing of Boston police officer John O'Keefe, her boyfriend at the time. CBS News Boston's Penny Kmitt reports.
